author: Soma
description: We invite you to volunteer your spare Twitter account to help us archive Twitter by the keyword of your preference. This initiative is a not-for-profit endeavor, sponsored by the Koii Foundation. Before participating, please ensure that your volunteer Twitter account has passed the verification process. Rewards are calculated based on the amount of time your node remains online. The longer you stay online, the greater the reward you will receive. The base bounty per round is 5000 KOII, which will be divided among users who have made submissions in the last round.

requirementsTags.description: The username of your volunteer Twitter account. Please ensure your volunteer Twitter account has passed the Twitter verification process.
The password of your volunteer Twitter account.
If verification is required, will use your phone number to login.
Enter the keyword you want to search. For example, apple.
